movie.title: Close Encounters of the Third Kind
movie.title_english: Close Encounters of the Third Kind
movie.title_long: Close Encounters of the Third Kind (1977)
movie.description_intro: Two parallel stories are told. In the first, a group of research scientists from a variety of backgrounds are investigating the strange appearance of items in remote locations, primarily desert regions. In continuing their investigation, one of the lead scientists, a Frenchman named Claude Lacombe, incorporates the Kodály method of music education as a means of communication in their work. The response, in turn, at first baffles the researchers, until American cartographer David Laughlin deciphers the meaning of the response. In the second, electric company lineman and family man Roy Neary and single mother Jillian Guiler are among some individuals in Muncie, Indiana who experience some paranormal activity before some flashes of bright lights in the sky, which they believe to be a UFO. Roy becomes obsessed with what he saw, unlike some others, especially in some form of authority, who refuse to acknowledge their belief that it was a UFO in not wanting to appear crazy. That obsession ...

In the first, a group of research scientists from a variety of backgrounds are investigating the strange appearance of items in remote locations, primarily desert regions. In the second, electric company lineman and family man Roy Neary and single mother Jillian Guiler are among some individuals in Muncie, Indiana who experience some paranormal activity before some flashes of bright lights in the sky, which they believe to be a UFO. Roy becomes obsessed with what he saw, unlike some others, especially in some form of authority, who refuse to acknowledge their belief that it was a UFO in not wanting to appear crazy. That obsession ...

movies.title: Adventures of Serial Buddies
movies.summary: A coincidental encounter forces four dimwits to join forces and embark upon an idiotic and altogether hilarious road trip, encountering skinheads, fraternity jocks, sorority babes, missing children, bikers, porn stars, clowns, and Kathie Lee Gifford.
movies.description_full: A coincidental encounter forces four dimwits to join forces and embark upon an idiotic and altogether hilarious road trip, encountering skinheads, fraternity jocks, sorority babes, missing children, bikers, porn stars, clowns, and Kathie Lee Gifford.

movies.title: Trader Games
movies.summary: A hot young Wall Street trader finds a formula based on climatology to play the market and win big... but at what cost?
movies.description_full: A hot young Wall Street trader finds a formula based on climatology to play the market and win big... but at what cost?
movies.synopsis: A hot young Wall Street trader finds a formula based on climatology to play the market and win big... but at what cost?

movies.title: The Sound Barrier
movies.summary: Tony successful fighter pilot during World War II marries into the family of a wealthy oil magnate who also designs airplanes. The movie traces the company's attempt to break the sound barrier, as well as tensions between father and daughter. Lots of footage of early 50s jet aviation in Great Britain as well as shots of the Comet airliner, world's first jet passenger plane.

movies.title: The Soviet Garden
movies.summary: A filmmaker from Moldova tries to discover the truth about Soviet experiments in atomic gardening.
movies.description_full: A filmmaker from Moldova tries to discover the truth about Soviet experiments in atomic gardening.
